404NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found.

cookieParam.name: cookie
cookieParam.description: PHPSESSID to be passed as a header

tokenParam.name: CSRFToken
tokenParam.description: CSRFToken to be passed as a header

get.summary: Give an API endpoint as query parameter for GET operation

post.summary: Give an API endpoint as query parameter for POST operation

delete.summary: Give an API endpoint as query parameter for DELETE operation

get.description: original endpont: form/categories; calls form.php getAllCategories()

delete.description: original endpont:formStack/[text]; **move ths was formstack; calls FormStack.php deleteForm({categoryID})

get.description: original endpont:form/[text]/flat; calls same search function, but uses {categoryID}, but calls flattenFullFormData() on the result

post.description: original endpont: calls formStack.php importForm(), header(''Location: ./form'')

get.description: original endpont:form/[digit]; calls getForm({recordID}); get form for this record
original endpont:ajaxJSON.php?a=getlastaction; calls FormWorkflow.php initRecordID({recordID}), getLastAction()
original endpont:formWorkflow/[digit]/apply; calls FormWorkflow.php initRecordID({recordID}), handleAction({dependencyID}, {actionType}, {comment})
original endpont:formWorkflow/[digit]/currentStep; calls FormWorkflow.php initRecordID({recordID}), getCurrentSteps()

post.description: original endpont:formWorkflow/[digit]/step; calls initRecordID({recordID}), setStep({stepID}, false, {comment})

get.description: original endpont:system/templates/[text]/standard; calls System.php getTemplate({fileName}, true)
riginal endpont:classicphonebook/search; calls search() function from VAMC_Directory()
riginal endpont:classicphonebook/search/[text]; calls search({searchText}) function from VAMC_Directory()
original endpont:FTEData/selecteeSheet; calls form->getCustomData() from form.php, but most of the logic is in the controller
original endpont:FTEData/selecteeSheetDateRange; calls form->getCustomData() from form.php, but most of the logic is in the controller

get.summary: Does all the logic in controller
get.description: original endpont:simpledata/equiptest; does all the logic in controller
